dcterms:description: ScanNet is a richly-annotated dataset of 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, providing a comprehensive resource for training and evaluating algorithms in 3D scene understanding.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:creator: Armen Avetisyan
Manuel Dahnert

dcterms:description: SceneCAD is a dataset that provides layout annotations for noisy RGB-D scans from the ScanNet dataset, facilitating the study of layout estimation in 3D scenes.
dcterms:title: SceneCAD

dcterms:description: ShapeNet is an information-rich repository of 3D models that serves as a benchmark for various tasks in 3D computer vision, including object recognition and retrieval.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet

dcterms:creator: John Lambert
Zhuang Liu
Ozan Sener

dcterms:description: MSeg is a composite dataset designed for multi-domain semantic segmentation, providing a diverse set of images and annotations for training and evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: MSEG
